text: @narendramodi Number of Covid-19 cases increasing in Saudi Arabia nowadays. We feel panic situation ,airport is closed . Kindly request to @narendramodi @PMOIndia to help us . however company is taking care of us but still we don’t want to stay here in this kind of situation .
